questions.text: Who voiced the villainous couple, Scarlet and Herb Overkill?
questions.explanation:
Sandra Bullock and John Hamm.

	Scarlet Overkill was Sandra Bullock's first villainous character in both voice and live action character. For her role as Scarlet Overkill, Sandra Bullock was nominated for a Kids Choice Award. In 2010, Sandra won an Oscar for her role as Leanne Tuohy in "The Blind Side". John Hamm has done voice work for several animated movies and TV shows. In 2016, John won a Golden Globe for his work as Don Draper in AMC's "Mad Men".

questions.text: Who was the narrator of the movie "Minions"?
questions.explanation:
Geoffrey Rush.

	As narrator, Geoffrey Rush said the last word in the movie when he described young Gru as "despicable". This isn't the first movie Geoffrey Rush has done voice work on. He was the voice actor for Tomar-Re in "Green Lantern" and Nigel in "Finding Nemo". Geoffrey has also done the narration on several TV shows and movies.

questions.text: When the Minions first walked on land, who did they find for their first boss?
questions.explanation:
T-Rex.

	When the Minions first came on land, they found a T-Rex to be their first boss. Unfortunately, the Minions accidentally killed the T-Rex as they did with several other bosses including a vampire, an Egyptian Pharaoh, and a caveman.

questions.text: When being chased by the police, which minion withdrew a sword from a stone and tried to use it in his defense against the police?
questions.explanation:
Bob.

	While running away from the police after trying to get the queen's crown, Bob withdrew the sword from the stone and tried to use it against the police. Everyone was flabbergasted by this action and because of his actions Bob was made King of England. His first act of king was to abdicate the throne and make Scarlet Overkill the queen.

questions.text: The Minions made their home in a cave in Antarctica. Which Minion's idea was it to leave the ice cave to find a new boss?
questions.explanation:
Kevin.

	Kevin decided he wanted to leave the cave to look for a new boss. He took Bob and Stuart with him and together they travelled to New York. The year they arrived was 1968.

questions.text: After defeating Scarlet Overkill, Kevin, Bob, and Stuart went back to the Antarctica cave to get the other Minions.
questions.explanation:
False.

	After killing one of the Yetis in Antarctica, the Minions went to London to find Bob, Kevin, and Stuart.

questions.text: On their first night with Scarlet Overkill, what bedtime story did Scarlet tell the Minions?
questions.explanation:
Three Little Pigs.

	Scarlet put the Minions into the story she was telling and ended it by telling the Minions if they didn't succeed with the plan she would destroy them.

questions.text: When Stuart, Bob, and Kevin won the right to be Scarlet Overkill's Minions, what city did she take them to begin her devious plot?
questions.explanation:
London.

	Bob, Stuart, and Kevin won the right to be Scarlet Overkill's Minions when they snatched a ruby from her hand. The three Minions then set off with Scarlet in her flying machine to London where she wanted the Minions to steal Queen Victoria's crown.

questions.text: What was the name of the city that was holding the Villain Convention that Bob, Stuart, and Kevin wanted to attend?
questions.explanation:
Orlando.

	Bob, Stuart, and Kevin hitched a ride with a couple and their three kids to Orlando where all of them were headed for the Villain Convention. Neither Bob, Stuart, or Kevin were found to be villainous enough until they met Scarlet Overkill.

questions.text: Did Gru from "Despicable Me" make an appearance in "Minions"?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	A young Gru was seen at the Villain Convention and then again at the end of the movie when he stole the crown from Scarlet and Herb Overkill.
